tooltip.soundvisualizer.color: Click the colored square to open the color wheel
tooltip.soundvisualizer.size: Controls the arc span / dot size
tooltip.soundvisualizer.width: Stroke thickness of ARCH and CHEVRON indicators
tooltip.soundvisualizer.radius: Distance from the center of the screen
tooltip.soundvisualizer.maxHearingDistan: Sounds further than this distance will be ignored (Default: 16)
tooltip.soundvisualizer.whitelist: Only these sounds will appear. Press + to add sound IDs (e.g. minecraft:entity.zombie.ambient)
tooltip.soundvisualizer.blacklist: These sounds will never appear. Press + to add sound IDs
